div.p: This optional element is attached to BIOGRAPHY BIRTH BIRTHPOSITION . It allows us to systematize information concerning women writers through its values of Eldest, Youngest and Only. If all you know is that she was the fifth child, use this tag but leave the attribute blank.

div.codeblock: <BIRTHPOSITION POSITION="eldest">Because she was the eldest in her family, she was responsible for helping to educate her younger siblings.</BIRTHPOSITION>

div.p: While we cannot systematize all birth positions, we are particularly interested in the effects of being an only, eldest, or youngest child, therefore, include attribute when known.
